code: import Swal from'sweetalert2';import{ThumbsUp,ThumbsDown}from'react-feather';import withReactContent from'sweetalert2-react-content';import{Card,CardHeader,CardBody,CardTitle,Button,CardText}from'reactstrap';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var MySwal=withReactContent(Swal);var BasicSweetAlert=function BasicSweetAlert(){var handleBasicTitleAlert=function handleBasicTitleAlert(){return MySwal.fire({title:'Any fool can use a computer',customClass:{confirmButton:'btn btn-primary'},buttonsStyling:false});};var handleTitleAlert=function handleTitleAlert(){return MySwal.fire({title:'The Internet?,',text:'That thing is still around?',customClass:{confirmButton:'btn btn-primary'},buttonsStyling:false});};var handleFooterAlert=function handleFooterAlert(){return MySwal.fire({icon:'error',title:'Oops...',text:'Something went wrong!',footer:'Why do I have this issue?',customClass:{confirmButton:'btn btn-primary'},buttonsStyling:false});};var handleHTMLAlert=function handleHTMLAlert(){return MySwal.fire({title:'HTML example',icon:'info',html:'You can use bold text, '+'links '+'and other HTML tags',showCloseButton:true,showCancelButton:true,focusConfirm:false,confirmButtonText:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"align-middle",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ThumbsUp,{className:"mr-50",size:15}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"align-middle",children:"Great!"})]}),cancelButtonText:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ThumbsDown,{size:15}),customClass:{confirmButton:'btn btn-primary',cancelButton:'btn btn-outline-danger ml-1'},buttonsStyling:false});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardHeader,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardTitle,{tag:"h4",children:"Basic"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardBody,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardText,{className:"mb-0",children:"SweetAlert automatically centers itself on the page and looks great no matter if you're using a desktop computer, mobile or tablet. It's even highly customizable, as you can see below!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"demo-inline-spacing",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"primary",onClick:handleBasicTitleAlert,outline:true,children:"Basic"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"primary",onClick:handleTitleAlert,outline:true,children:"With Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"primary",onClick:handleFooterAlert,outline:true,children:"With Footer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"primary",onClick:handleHTMLAlert,outline:true,children:"HTML"})]})]})]});};export default BasicSweetAlert;
